Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should speak with Radagast.
'Use the special food I have given you.'
'I am glad your travels were a success.'
Chickens can be found all over Middle-earth.\n\nRescue chickens using Radagast's calming treats.

You give a tasty treat to the chicken!
'Use the special food I have given you to befriend some chickens. They'll be safe in Rhosgobel where I can tend to them. I'm counting on you, [placeholder].'
You give a tasty treat to the chicken!
Speak with Radagast
You give a tasty treat to the chicken!
Befriending Critters: A Cluck in Time
Radagast the Brown asks you help him rescue chickens and bring them back to the safety of Rhosgobel.

'Ah, thank you! I see you were able to bring back a couple of chickens with you. I am glad your travels were a success.\n\n'You have a good rapport with the animals. This skill will aid you on your journeys ahead.'
